fn.p: Funding. Financial support was provided to LL from the Swedish Foundation for Strategic Research SSF; part of the "PaReTree” project, coordinator: Stefan Jansson, PI: A-KB-K and the Royal Institute of Technology (KTH), Department of Chemistry. Support was also provided by the research council for sustainable development FORMAS to TZ (project 229-2011-890), by the Skogssällskapet foundation to NB (project 1213-111/159-9), and by the Swedish Research Council (project 2018-05389) and FORMAS (project 942-2016-37) to AP.
